products.title: Advanced Fields
products.name: User Registration-Advanced Fields
products.excerpt: Get more custom fields for your registration forms! Use the Advanced Fields add-on to collect vital information from users.

products.title: WooCommerce Integration
products.name: User Registration - WooCommerce
products.excerpt: Add shipping/billing fields to registration forms and sync form data with the checkout page for a pleasant customer experience.

products.title: Customize My Account
products.name: User Registration customize my account
products.excerpt: Create, edit, and delete additional tabs on the user account page. You can add custom content for individual tabs.

products.title: File Upload
products.name: User Registration - File Upload
products.excerpt: Users can upload single or multiple files during registration. Several file types are available along with customizable file size limits.

products.title: Style Customizer
products.name: User Registration Style Customizer
products.excerpt: Leverage the power of the User Registration Style Customizer add-on to personalize the look and feel of your registration and login forms.

products.title: Conditional Logic
products.name: User Registration Conditional Logic
products.excerpt: Create dynamic registration forms quickly! Show or hide specific form fields based on user input in previous fields.

products.title: Multi Step Forms
products.name: User Registration Multi Part
products.excerpt: Say goodbye to long and tedious forms! Divide your registration forms into multiple steps for a streamlined signup process.

products.title: Field Visibility
products.name: User Registration Field Visibility
products.excerpt: Control the visibility of particular form fields in the form or the account page. You can hide/show fields or make them read-only.

products.title: Email Templates
products.name: User Registration Email Templates
products.excerpt: Create a new email template or customize pre-designed email templates that match the look and feel of your website and brand.

products.title: Social Connect
products.name: User Registration - Social Connect
products.excerpt: The Social Connect add-on allows users to login or register with social platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Google+.

products.title: MailChimp
products.name: User Registration - Mailchimp
products.excerpt: Connect your mailing lists with User Registration forms and achieve incredible results in your email marketing efforts.

products.title: Profile Connect
products.name: User Registration Profile Connect
products.excerpt: Need to connect users registered via other plugins to User Registration forms? Try the Profile Connect add-on for seamless connection.

products.title: Invite Codes
products.name: User Registration Invite Codes
products.excerpt: Allow only users with invite codes to register on your site. You can create multiple invitation codes, set usage limits, etc.

products.title: PDF Form Submission
products.name: User Registration PDF Form Submission
products.excerpt: Export user registration form data to a PDF file. You can customize the PDF paper size, font, orientation, header text, and more.

products.title: LearnDash
products.name: User Registration LearnDash
products.excerpt: Automatically enroll users to a specified LearnDash course during registration. You can also view which courses a user is enrolled in.

products.title: Import Users
products.name: User Registration Import Users
products.excerpt: Quickly import users to a registration form. You’ll need a user data file in CSV format to map the fields and import them correctly.

products.title: Geolocation
products.name: User Registration Geolocation
products.excerpt: The Geolocation add-on is a must-have for collecting geolocation data on registered users. You can also add Google Maps to forms.

products.title: Stripe
products.name: User Registration Stripe
products.excerpt: Accept credit card payments using the Stripe gateway. You can collect donations, subscription fees, etc. securely.

products.title: Two Factor Authentication
products.name: User Registration Two Factor Authentication
products.excerpt: Avoid data breaches with the Two Factor Authentication (2FA) system, which provides a OTP-based verification for users.

products.title: Zapier
products.name: User Registration Zapier
products.excerpt: With the Zapier add-on, you can easily automate your work by connecting User Registration forms to 1500+ applications.

products.title: Profile Completeness
products.name: User Registration Profile Completeness
products.excerpt: Display a progress bar to indicate the completeness of a user profile and encourage users to complete their profiles.

products.title: Private Notes
products.name: User Registration Private Notes
products.excerpt: Share important updates, personalized messages, etc., with users. Provide a platform for users to ask questions and receive answers.

products.title: ActiveCampaign
products.name: User Registration ActiveCampaign
products.excerpt: Effortlessly link your ActiveCampaign account to User Registration forms using the ActiveCampaign add-on and enable seamless subscriber collection.

products.title: MailerLite
products.name: User Registration MailerLite
products.excerpt: Connect your registered users to MailerLite lists. You can then use the collected data for a fruitful marketing campaign.

products.title: Save and Continue
products.name: User Registration Save and Continue
products.excerpt: Enable users to save registration forms they’ve partially filled so that they can complete the submission later.

products.title: Post Submissions
products.name: User Registration Post Submissions
products.excerpt: Let users create posts on your WordPress site from a front-end registration form without accessing the admin dashboard.

products.title: Klaviyo
products.name: User Registration Klaviyo
products.excerpt: Connect your Klaviyo account with User Registration and add users registering on your site to any Klaviyo subscriber list.

products.title: Conversational Forms
products.name: User Registration Conversational Forms
products.excerpt: Transform your boring and simple registration forms and make them super interactive.

products.title: Form Restriction
products.name: User Registration Form Restriction
products.excerpt: Restrict access with custom conditions and optimize your website’s user registration system.
